department.ch: 國際經營管理碩士學位學程
department.en: International Master of Business Administration program

goal.ch: To help students understand the important issues in production and operation management and learn the necessary methods for solving the related problems.
goal.en: To help students understand the important issues in production and operation management and learn the necessary methods for solving the related problems.

outline.ch:
1 Introduction to Operations and Supply Chain Management: Introduction of Different Production Systems
2 Introduction to Operations and Supply Chain Management: Strategy
3 Introduction to Operations and Supply Chain Management: Quantitative Methods, e.g. methods for Decision Making, Forecasting and Optimization Methods
4 Introduction to Operations and Supply Chain Management: Quantitative Methods, e.g. methods for Decision Making, Forecasting and Optimization Methods. Supply Chain Operations and Quality Issues: Quality Philosophy. Harvard Business Review Supply Chain Paper (The Triple A Supply Chain)
5 Supply Chain Operations and Quality Issues: (Quality Philosophy) Harvard Business Review Supply Chain Paper (Leading-A-Supply-Chain-Turnaround)
6 Supply Chain Operations and Quality Issues: (Quality Control Methods) Harvard Business Review Supply Chain Paper (Aligning Incentives in Supply Chains)
7 Supply Chain Operations and Quality Issues: (Quality Control Methods), Supply Chain Design: (Lean System) Harvard Business Review Supply Chain Paper (Rapid Fire Fulfillment)
8 期中考試
9 Supply Chain Design: (Lean System) Harvard Business Review Supply Chain Paper (Building Deep Supplier Relationships)
10 Supply Chain Design: (Lean System) Harvard Business Review Supply Chain Paper (We Are in This Together)
11 Supply Chain Management Issues: (Inventory Control, Supply and Demand Management) Harvard Business Review Toyota Production System Paper (Learning to Lead at Toyota)
12 Supply Chain Management Issues: (Inventory Control, Supply and Demand Management)
13 Supply Chain Management Issues: (Inventory Control, Supply and Demand Management)
14 Logistics Management, Planning, and Scheduling: (Layout, Location and Transportation)
15 Logistics Management, Planning, and Scheduling: (Production Planning and Scheduling)
16 Information Technology and Applications: (MRP, ERP and Information System) Harvard Business Review RFID Paper (Have Your Object Call My Object)
17 Information Technology and Applications: (MRP, ERP and Information System)
18 期末考
